Html:
I'm french, so I'd to "update from wowhead" after each (?) release.

How can I back up this data base ? or how can I reduce this data base ?

(the complete update takes more than 2 hours...)
<Rawr Directory>\Data\ItemCache.xml is the file you're looking for, I believe.
He'll also need ItemSource since that will have to be translated too
Thank you, can I reduce the database ?
You can do whatever you want on your end so long as it still loads :P
OKand thank you so much for Rawr !
